publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2513 Fergus Ewing: Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid â€”That the Parliament congratulates all those involved in the Inverness Highland 2008 bid for the title of European Capital of Culture; notes that the Inverness Highland 2008 bid is the only Scottish one, and recognises that a successful bid would bring important social, economic and cultural rewards for Scotland in general and for Inverness and the Highlands in particular.

S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Stewart Stevenson*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ian Jenkins*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Michael Russell*, Dennis Canavan*, John Farquhar Munro*

S1M-2513 Fergus Ewing: Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid -That the Parliament congratulates all those involved in the Inverness Highland bid 2008 for the title of European Capital of Culture; notes that the Inverness Highland 2008 bid is the only Scottish one, and recognises that a successful bid would bring important social, economic and cultural rewards for Scotland in general and for Inverness and the Highlands in particular. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Stewart Stevenson, Murdo Fraser, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Richard Lochhead, Mr Andrew Welsh, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Gil Paterson, Roseanna Cunningham, Fiona McLeod, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ian Jenkins, Dr Winnie Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Dennis Canavan, John Farquhar Munro
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Maureen Macmillan*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2513 Inverness Highland European Capital of Culture 2008 Bid (lodged on 3 December 2001) Rhoda Grant*
